main event: A witness reported seeing a bright, oval-shaped object with a light in the center, hovering and circling in the sky near Spencer, Indiana on June 6, 1964.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 50-60 feet in diameter.
The object disappeared into the clouds.
The witness had previously reported a similar sighting in the same area on June 6, 1964.
Another witness, John J. Jones from Terre Haute, Indiana, also reportedly saw the object.
The witness was 22 years old at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: bright, oval-shaped object with a light in the center
